name: Platinum Member Exclusive - Morpheus8 Launch
subject: Sarah, exclusive first access to Morpheus8
previewText: As our Platinum member, experience the latest in skin tightening
content:
Dear Sarah,

As one of our most valued Platinum members, we're thrilled to offer you exclusive first access to our new Morpheus8 treatment.

Dr. Johnson mentioned during your last visit that you were interested in addressing skin texture concerns. Morpheus8 combines microneedling with radiofrequency to deliver remarkable results for skin tightening and texture improvement.

Exclusive Platinum Member Benefits:

  • 20% off your first Morpheus8 session
  • Complimentary post-treatment care kit ($200 value)
  • Priority booking with Dr. Johnson

Based on your treatment history with Botox and fillers, Morpheus8 would perfectly complement your anti-aging regimen.

Limited appointments available this month.

name: Post-Procedure Follow-Up - 1 Week
subject: Patricia, how are you feeling after your facelift touch-up?
previewText: We're here if you need anything
content:
Dear Patricia,

It's been a week since your facelift touch-up with Dr. Goldstein, and we wanted to check in on your recovery.

By now, you should be seeing the initial results settling in beautifully. Here are some reminders for optimal healing:

  • Continue gentle facial massage as demonstrated
  • Keep up with your prescribed skincare routine
  • Stay hydrated and get plenty of rest
  • Avoid strenuous activities for another week

If you have any concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Dr. Goldstein is available for a quick follow-up call if needed.

We're so pleased you chose us for your procedure, and we're here to support you throughout your recovery.
